string.name: android_market_description_text
string.translation_description: For the Android Market (not used in the app), the description text. Character limit: 4000.

resources.string:
Gunakan Laluan Saya semasa anda berlari, berbasikal, mengembara berjalan kaki atau melakukan aktiviti luar lain dan penderia GPS dalam telefon anda akan digunakan untuk merakam laluan yang anda ambil. Maklumat statistik yang berguna turut dikumpulkan seperti masa, kelajuan, jarak dan ketinggian. Anda boleh menyemak semua data ini secara langsung atau anda boleh menyimpannya untuk digunakan kemudian. Sementara anda berada di luar, anda boleh menandakan titik laluan yang berkaitan dan anda boleh meminta untuk mendengar pengumuman suara automatik tentang kemajuan anda.
 
 Laluan Saya boleh merakam data dari penderia luaran:
 - Pemantau denyut jantung Bluetooth HxM Pengguna Zephyr Technology
 - Pemantau denyut jantung Bluetooth Polar
 - Pemantau denyut jantung ANT+ (*)
 - Meter kuasa, penderia kelajuan dan kadens SRM (*)
 - Lagi sokongan penderia akan datang tidak lama lagi
 
 * Sokongan ANT+ dan SRM memerlukan telefon serasi ANT+
 
 Laluan Saya boleh berkongsi data laluan anda:
 - Sebagai fail GPX, KML, CSV atau TCX
 - Menggunakan Peta Google, Jadual Fusion Google atau Google Docs
 - Melalui Google+, Facebook atauTwitter
 
 Ciri-ciri lain:
 - Merakam dalam Unit Metrik atau Imperial (dikonfigurasi dari menu Rakaman, di bawah Tetapan)
 - Memaparkan pergerakan anda dalam Kelajuan atau Langkah (dikonfigurasi dari menu Paparan, di bawah Tetapan)
 
 Laluan Saya ialah projek sumber terbuka, sekiranya anda mahu menyumbang, sila lawati:
 
 http://mytracks.googlecode.com

string.name: eula_message_body
string.translation_description: The body in the Google mobile terms of service. See http://m.google.com/toscountry.

resources.string: Dengan menggunakan produk dan perkhidmatan (\"Services\") Google\', anda:

string.name: eula_message_date
string.translation_description: The date in the Google mobile terms of service. See http://m.google.com/toscountry.

string.name: eula_message_footer
string.translation_description: The footer in the Google mobile terms of service. See http://m.google.com/toscountry. %1$s: host name, 'm.google.com'

resources.string: Perkhidmatan mungkin mengandungi kandungan pihak ketiga. Sebarang atribusi atau notis yang diperlukan untuk kandungan pihak ketiga boleh didapati di %1$s/legalnotices.

string.name: eula_message_header
string.translation_description: The header in the Google mobile terms of service. See http://m.google.com/toscountry.

string.name: eula_message_item1
string.translation_description: The first item in the Google mobile terms of service. See http://m.google.com/toscountry. %1$s: host name, 'm.google.com' %2$s: host name, 'm.google.com' %3$s: host name, 'm.google.com' %4$s: host name, 'm.google.com' %5$s: host name, 'm.google.com'

resources.string: Bersetuju untuk terikat oleh syarat ini dan a) Syarat Penggunaan YouTube (%1$s/tos_youtube) untuk Perkhidmatan yang berkaitan dengan YouTube, b) Terma dan Syarat Peta Google (%2$s/tos_maps) untuk Perkhidmatan pemetaan setempat dan berasaskan lokasi, c ) Terma dan Syarat Google Buzz untuk Perkhidmatan yang berkaitan dengan Google Buzz (%3$s/tos_buzz), d) Syarat Perkhidmatan Buku Google (%4$s/tos_books) untuk Perkhidmatan yang berkaitan dengan Buku, dan e) Syarat Perkhidmatan Google (%5$s/utos) untuk semua Perkhidmatan lain, yang dikemas kini dari masa ke masa. Anda boleh menggunakan Perkhidmatan hanya seperti yang ditetapkan dalam perjanjian ini. Jangan memanipulasi semasa memandu.

string.name: eula_message_item2
string.translation_description: The second item in the Google mobile terms of service. See http://m.google.com/toscountry.

resources.string: Akui dan bersetuju bahawa pihak ketiga boleh menawarkan perkhidmatan dan bahawa anda mungkin tertakluk kepada syarat pihak ketiga dan bahawa pihak ketiga boleh menguatkuasakan syarat terhadap anda. Google tidak bertanggungjawab bagi perubahan Perkhidmatan pihak ketiga.

string.name: eula_message_item3
string.translation_description: The third item in the Google mobile terms of service. See http://m.google.com/toscountry. %1$s: host name, 'm.google.com'

resources.string: Persetujuan untuk pengumpulan, penggunaan, perkongsian dan pindahan seterusnya data anda termasuk tetapi tidak terhad kepada data suara dan lokasi seperti yang digariskan dalam Dasar Privasi Mudah Alih (%1$s/privacy). Data lokasi mungkin berasal daripada sumber yang bercampur dan mungkin tidak tepat. Penggunaan adalah atas risiko anda sendiri.

string.name: eula_message_item4
string.translation_description: The fourth item in the Google mobile terms of service. See http://m.google.com/toscountry.

resources.string: Memperakui bahawa Perkhidmatan tertentu memerlukan perkhidmatan telefon, akses data atau kebolehan mesej teks. Melainkan seperti yang dinyatakan sebaliknya, Google tidak mengenakan bayaran untuk Perkhidmatan tetapi kadar pembawa untuk telefon, data dan mesej teks mungkin dikenakan.

string.name: import_error

string.translation_description: When importing all the tracks, phrase for 'few' GPX files. %1$d an integer number. The number is a small number.

string.name: import_gpx_files_many
string.translation_description: When importing all the tracks, phrase for 'many' GPX files. %1$d an integer number. The number is a large number.

string.name: import_gpx_files_one
string.translation_description: When importing all the tracks, phrase for 1 GPX file.

string.name: import_gpx_files_other
string.translation_description: When importing all the tracks, phrase for 'other' GPX files, 'other' means for cases that the language does not require special treatment of the given quantity. %1$d an integer number.

string.name: import_gpx_files_two
string.translation_description: When importing all the tracks, phrase for 2 GPX files.

string.name: import_gpx_files_zero
string.translation_description: When importing all the tracks, phrase for 0 GPX files.

string.name: import_no_file

resources.string: Tiada fail GPX ditemui di %1$s. Kad SD mungkin tidak dapat dibaca atau direktori mungkin tidak mengandungi sebarang fail GPX.

string.name: import_success
string.translation_description: After importing all the tracks from the SD card, the alert message indicating success. %1$d the number of successfully imported tracks. E.g., '1'. %2$s the number of GPX files in the SD card. E.g., '1 GPX file' or '2 GPX files'. %3$s the SD card directory path. E.g., '/mnt/sdcard/MyTracks/gpx/'. Screenshot: import_success.png

string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the value for the 'Battery level'. E.g, 'Battery level: 50 %'. %1$d: a number. E.g., '50'. %%: escape sequence for the '%' character.

string.name: sensor_state_cadence
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the label for the cadence on the bike sensor. Cadence is the number of revolutions of the crank per minute. E.g., 'Cadence: 80 rpm'. Screenshot: sensor_state_none.png

string.name: sensor_state_cadence_value
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the value for the 'Cadence'. Cadence is the number of revolutions of the crank per minute. E.g., 'Cadence: 80 rpm'. %1$d: a number. E.g., '80'.

string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the 'Sensor state' value when the sensor has connected. Screenshot: sensor_state_connected.png

string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the 'Sensor state' value when the sensor has disconnected. Screenshot: sensor_state_disconnected.png

string.name: sensor_state_heart_rate_value

string.name: sensor_state_power_value
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the value for the 'Power'. Power is the power output of the rider. E.g., 'Power: 50 W'. %1$d: a number. E.g., '50'.

string.name: sensor_state_sending

string.name: settings_backup
string.translation_description: In the 'Settings' page, the option to change the data backup related settings. Character limit: ~26 (1 line) Screenshot: settings.png

string.name: settings_backup_now
string.translation_description: In the 'Backup' settings, under the 'SD card' section, the option to backup to the SD card now. Character limit: ~26 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_backup.png

string.name: settings_backup_now_progress_message
string.translation_description: In the 'Backup' settings, after pressing the 'Backup now' option, the progress dialog telling the user that it is writing all tracks and settings and that it may take a while. Screenshot: settings_backup_now_progress_message.png

resources.string: Menulis semua jejak dan tetapan ke kad SD. Hal ini mungkin mengambil masa...

string.name: settings_backup_now_summary
string.translation_description: In the 'Backup' settings, under the 'SD card' section, the summary for the 'Backup now' option explaining that all tracks and settings will be written to the SD card. Screenshot: settings_backup.png

resources.string: Tulis salinan penuh semua jejak dan tetapan anda ke kad SD.

string.name: settings_backup_restore
string.translation_description: In the 'Backup' settings, under the 'SD card' section, the option to restore everything from the SD card. Character limit: ~26 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_backup.png

string.name: settings_backup_restore_confirm_message
string.translation_description: In the 'Backup' settings, after pressing the 'Restore now' option, the message in the alert dialog asking the user to confirm that he wants to restore from a backup and it will overwrite all the current tracks and settings. Screenshot: settings_backup_restore_confirm_message.png

resources.string: Memulihkan sandaran dari kad SD akan menulis ganti semua jejak dan tetapan semasa anda. Adakah anda pasti?

string.name: settings_backup_restore_no_backup
string.translation_description: In the 'Backup' settings, after pressing the 'Restore now' option, the message in the alert dialog informing the user that there is no backup to restore from. Screenshot: settings_backup_restore_no_backup.png

string.name: settings_backup_restore_progress_message
string.translation_description: In the 'Backup' settings, after pressing the 'Restore now' option, the message on the progress dialog indicating that My Tracks is reading all tracks and settings from the backup on the SD card and that it may take a while. Screenshot: settings_backup_restore_progress.png

resources.string: Membaca semua jejak dan tetapan daripada kad SD. Hal ini mungkin mengambil masa......

string.name: settings_backup_restore_select_title
string.translation_description: In the 'Backup' settings, after pressing the 'Restore now' option, the title in the picker dialog asking the user to select a backup. Screenshot: settings_backup_restore_select_title.png

string.name: settings_backup_restore_summary
string.translation_description: In the 'Backup' settings, under the 'SD card' section, the summary for the 'Restore now' option explaining that it restores all tracks and settings from the SD card. Screenshot: settings_backup.png

resources.string: Pulihkan semua jejak dan tetapan dari kad SD.

string.name: settings_backup_sd_card
string.translation_description: In the 'Backup' settings, the section header for configuring backup to the SD card. Character limit: ~40 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_backup.png

string.name: settings_display
string.translation_description: In the 'Settings' page, the option to change the display related settings. Character limit: ~26 (1 line) Screenshot: settings.png

string.name: settings_display_metric
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, the checkbox option to use the metric units. Character limit: ~23 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_display.png

string.name: settings_display_metric_summary_off
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, the summary for the 'Use metric' checkbox when it is unchecked explaining using the imperial units to display distances. Screenshot: settings_display_unchecked.png

resources.string: Gunakan unit imperial untuk memaparkan jarak.

string.name: settings_display_metric_summary_on
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, the summary for the 'Use metric' checkbox when it is checked explaining using the metric units to display distances. Screenshot: settings_display.png

resources.string: Gunakan unit metrik untuk memaparkan jarak.

string.name: settings_display_speed
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, the checkbox option to display speed (e.g., 5 miles per hour) instead of pace (e.g., 0.2 hours per mile). Character limit: ~23 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_display.png

string.name: settings_display_speed_summary_off
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, the summary for the 'Display speed' checkbox when it is unchecked explaining that pace (e.g., 0.2 hours per mile) will be used instead of speed (e.g., 5 miles per hour). Screenshot: settings_display_unchecked.png

string.name: settings_display_speed_summary_on
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, the summary for the 'Display speed' checkbox when it is checked explaining that speed (e.g., 5 miles per hour) will be used instead of pace (e.g., 0.2 hours per mile). Screenshot: settings_display.png

string.name: settings_display_track_color
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, the dropdown option to choose a track color mode for how to use different colors to color a track based on slow, medium, and fast speed. Character limit: ~23 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_display.png

string.name: settings_display_track_color_dynamic
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, for the 'Color mode' dropdown, the option to use different colors to color a track based on dynamically determined speed thresholds. E.g., use one color when the speed is below the slow speed threshold. Character limit: ~21 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_display_track_color_option.png

string.name: settings_display_track_color_dynamic_medium
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, under the 'Dynamic thresholds' configurations, the option for configuring the percentage from the average speed for the medium speed range. The color mode will use different colors to color a track depending on whether the speed is above, in, or below the medium speed range. Character limit: ~23 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_display.png

string.name: settings_display_track_color_dynamic_medium_summary
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, under the 'Dynamic thresholds' configurations, the summary for the 'Percentage' option explaining that it sets the percentage from the average speed for the medium speed range. The color mode will use different colors to color a track depending on whether the speed is above, in, or below the medium speed range. Screenshot: settings_display.png

resources.string: Peratusan daripada kelajuan purata untuk julat kelajuan sederhana.

string.name: settings_display_track_color_fixed
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, for the 'Color mode' dropdown, the option to use different colors to color a track based on fixed speed thresholds. E.g., use one color when the speed is below the slow speed threshold. Character limit: ~21 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_display_track_color_option.png

string.name: settings_display_track_color_fixed_medium
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, under the 'Fixed thresholds' configurations, the option for configuring the medium speed threshold. Thus any speed lower than the threshold but greater than the slow speed threshold will be colored by the medium speed color. Character limit: ~23 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_display.png

string.name: settings_display_track_color_fixed_medium_summary
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, under the 'Fixed thresholds' configurations, the summary for the 'Medium speed' option explaining that it sets a cutoff speed for the medium speed color. Screenshot: settings_display.png

string.name: settings_display_track_color_fixed_slow
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, under the 'Fixed thresholds' configurations, the option for configuring the slow speed threshold. Thus any speed lower than the threshold will be colored by the slow speed color. Character limit: ~23 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_display.png

string.name: settings_display_track_color_fixed_slow_summary
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, under the 'Fixed thresholds' configurations, the summary for the 'Slow speed' option explaining that it sets a cutoff speed for the slow speed color. Screenshot: settings_display.png

string.name: settings_display_track_color_single
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, for the 'Color mode' dropdown, the option to use a single color for all speeds. Character limit: ~21 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_display_track_color_option.png

string.name: settings_display_track_color_summary
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, the summary for the 'Color mode' dropdown explaining that it configures how colors are used to color a track based on slow, medium, and fast speed. Screenshot: settings_display.png

resources.string: Cara mewarnakan jejak berdasarkan kelajuan perlahan, sederhana dan tinggi.

string.translation_description: In the 'Sharing' settings, after checking the 'Allow access' checkbox, the confirmation dialog message informing the user that other apps, including apps installed in the future, will be able to control and access My Tracks data. In addition, no further notification of third party app access will be shown.

resources.string: Apl lain, termasuk apl masa hadapan, akan dapat mengawal dan mengakses data Jejak Saya. Tiada lagi pemberitahuan lanjut akan diberikan.

string.name: settings_sharing_allow_access_summary_off

resources.string: Apl lain tidak dapat membaca, menulis, memulakan/menghentikan rakaman data Jejak Saya.

string.name: settings_sharing_allow_access_summary_on

resources.string: Apl lain dapat membaca, menulis, memulakan/menghentikan rakaman data Jejak Saya.

string.name: voice_template
string.translation_description: For the voice announcement, the template to make an announcement. %1$s: distance string. E.g., '1 mile' or '1.2 miles', '1 kilometer', '2.2 kilometers' %2$s: time string. E.g., '1 hour and 30 minutes' or '20 minutes 1 second' %3$s: speed/pace string. For speed, e.g., '2.2 miles per hour', '1 kilometer per hour'. For pace, e.g., '2 hours 1 minute per mile', '30 minutes 1 second per kilometer'.

string.name: welcome_about
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the button on the bottom to open the 'About My Tracks' dialog. Screenshot: welcome.png

string.name: welcome_add_graph_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on adding graphs to the graphs view. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Dalam paparan graf, Menu -> Tetapan carta.

string.name: welcome_add_graph_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on adding graphs to the graphs view. Screenshot: welcome.png

string.name: welcome_app_navigation_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on app navigation. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Sentuh peta. Anak panah kiri dan kanan akan muncul. Sentuh anak panah ini untuk mengitar antara paparan peta, statistik dan graf.

string.name: welcome_app_navigation_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on app navigation. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Bagaimana cara melihat peta, statistik dan paparan graf?

string.name: welcome_battery_life_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on battery life. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Penerima GPS menggunakan jumlah kuasa yang agak tinggi, maka bateri yang dicas penuh dapat bertahan kurang daripada 5 jam. Hayat bateri bergantung pada banyak faktor, termasuk kekuatan isyarat, kebaharuan bateri dan tugasan yang dijalankan secara selari. Memadamkan sesetengah atau semua radio telefon akan memanjangkan hayat bateri. Meletakkan telefon dalam mod Pesawat akan memberi hasil yang lebih baik.

string.name: welcome_battery_life_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on battery life. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Berapa lamakah bateri akan tahan semasa merakam jejak?

string.name: welcome_data_connection_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on data connection. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Isyarat selular atau sambungan data tidak diperlukan untuk merakam jejak GPS. Walau bagaimanapun, sekiranya tidak terdapat sambungan data, anda tidak akan dapat melihat peta. Sebaliknya, anda akan melihat skrin kelabu atau peta separa. Jejak, digambarkan sebagai garis mudah, masih dapat dirakam meskipun tiada sambungan data.

string.name: welcome_data_connection_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on data connection. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Adakah saya memerlukan isyarat selular dan sambungan data untuk menggunakan Jejak Saya?

string.name: welcome_delete_all_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on deleting all tracks. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Menu -> Jejak -> Padamkan semua. Hal ini memadamkan jejak yang dirakam daripada memori secara kekal. Sekiranya anda telah menyimpan jejak ke kad SD, anda hendaklah memadamkannya secara berasingan. Jejak yang dimuat naik ke Peta Google, Jadual Fusion Google dan Google Docs hendaklah turut dipadamkan secara berasingan.

string.name: welcome_delete_all_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on deleting all tracks. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Bagaimana cara memadamkan semua jejak dari telefon?

string.name: welcome_edit_accuracy_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on editing points. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Setelah anda memuat naik jejak ke Peta Google, Jadual Fusion Google atau Google Docs, anda dapat mengalihkan, memadamkan atau menyisip setiap titik jejak seperti yang diingini.

string.name: welcome_edit_accuracy_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on editing points. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Bagaimana cara mengedit atau membetulkan jejak untuk menjadikannya tepat?

string.name: welcome_elevation_precision_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on elevation precision. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Penerima GPS mengukur ketinggian kurang tepat berbanding latitud dan longitud. Ketinggian kadangkala berbeza dalam beberapa ratus kaki walaupun perubahan relatif dijejak dengan lebih tepat lagi. Untuk mendapat ukuran ketinggian yang baik, pastikan anda mempunyai isyarat GPS yang baik dan tunggu beberapa minit bagi ketinggian itu mencapai nilai stabil.

string.name: welcome_elevation_precision_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on elevation precision. Screenshot: welcome.png

string.name: welcome_gps_fix_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on the GPS fix message. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Untuk Jejak Saya berfungsi, telefon anda perlu berada dalam hubungan garis tampak dengan satelit GPS. Jika garis tampak dihalang oleh pokok, bangunan atau dinding ngarai, anda mungkin tidak mendapat tetapan yang tepat. Jika anda melihat mesej itu, sila tunggu seminit dua. Sekiranya peranti anda tidak mencapai tetapan, beralih ke kawasan yang tidak berhalangan dan cuba lagi.

string.name: welcome_gps_fix_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on the GPS fix message. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Mengapa aplikasi kadangkala memaparkan \"Menunggu tetapan GPS yang lebih baik. Pastikan langit kelihatan.\"?

string.name: welcome_location_precision_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on location precision. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Di bawah keadaan optimum, ralat lokasi boleh menjadi +/- 20 kaki (6 meter). Walau bagaimanapun, ketepatan bergantung pada kualiti isyarat GPS. Bulatan biru di sekeliling anak panah lokasi oren menunjukkan ketepatan anggaran. (Anda mungkin perlu mengezum masuk atau keluar untuk melihat bulatan itu). Anda boleh menukar ketepatan GPS di Tetapan -> Rakaman -> ketepatan GPS. Jika ketepatan terlalu rendah, anda akan melihat mesej \"Menunggu tetapan GPS yang lebih baik.\" di bahagian atas skrin.

string.name: welcome_location_precision_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on location precision. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Apakah ketepatan jejak yang dirakamkan itu?

string.name: welcome_maps_sharing_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on Google Maps visibility. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Secara lalainya, peta baharu adalah terbuka. Untuk menukar lalai ini kepada tidak tersenarai, nyahtandakan Tetapan -> Perkongsian -> Siarkan peta baharu secara terbuka. Anda boleh menukar keterlihatan semua peta anda di Tempat saya dalam Peta Google.

string.name: welcome_maps_sharing_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on Google Maps visibility. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Siapa yang dapat melihat peta yang saya hantarkan ke Peta Google?

string.name: welcome_my_tracks_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on what is My Tracks. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Jejak Saya membenarkan anda merakam jejak GPS dan menggambarkan pengembaraan berjalan kaki anda, aktiviti larian, berbasikal atau sebarang aktiviti lain semasa melihat statistik prestasi secara langsung. Jejak Saya memudahkan anda mengarkib sejarah latihan dengan Peta Google, Jadual Fusion Google dan Google Docs, serta mengongsi aktiviti anda dengan rakan dan seluruh dunia.

string.name: welcome_my_tracks_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on what is My Tracks. Screenshot: welcome.png

string.name: welcome_send_google_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on sending a track to Google. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Ketik butang Pilihan yang terletak di penjuru bahagian bawah kanan paparan peta dan pilih \"Hantar kepada Google...\".

string.name: welcome_send_google_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on sending a track to Google. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Bagaimana cara untuk menghantar jejak saya ke Peta Google, Jadual Fusion Google dan Google Docs?

string.name: welcome_share_file_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on sharing a file. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Anda boleh menggunakan Google Earth atau aplikasi serupa untuk menggambarkan dan mengedit jejak GPS.

string.name: welcome_share_file_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on sharing a file. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Apa yang dapat saya lakukan dengan jejak setelah menyimpannya ke kad SD atau mengongsi fail sedemikian dengan rakan?

string.name: welcome_share_friends_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on sharing a track with friends. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Ketik butang Pilihan yang terletak di bucu bawah bahagian kanan paparan peta dan pilih \"Kongsi dengan rakan...\". Anda boleh mengongsi jejak sebagai pautan ke Peta Google atau Jadual Fusion Google (anda akan digesa untuk memuat naik jejak itu dahulu) atau sebagai fail GPX, KML, CSV atau TCX dalam lampiran e-mel.

string.name: welcome_share_friends_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on sharing a track with friends. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Bagaimana cara mengongsi jejak dengan rakan dan seluruh dunia?

string.name: welcome_split_track_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on splitting long tracks. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Jejak pada Peta Google dan Jadual Fusion Google dihadkan kepada saiz tertentu.

string.name: welcome_split_track_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on splitting long tracks. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Mengapa jejak yang sangat panjang dipecahkan kepada berbilang segmen apabila menghantarnya ke Peta Google dan Jadual Fusion Google?

string.name: welcome_statistics_marker_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on statistics markers. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Penanda statistik digunakan untuk membahagikan jejak untuk mengira statistik setiap bahagian. Contohnya, katalah anda sedang merakam penunggangan basikal menaiki bukit, anda boleh menyisipkan satu penanda statistik di kaki bukit dan satu lagi di puncaknya dengan menekan Menu -> Penanda -> Sisip statistik.

string.name: welcome_statistics_marker_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on statistics markers. Screenshot: welcome.png

string.name: welcome_title
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the title of the page. Screenshot: welcome.png

string.name: welcome_waypoint_marker_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on waypoint markers. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Penanda titik laluan digunakan untuk menganotasi lokasi. Contohnya, sekiranya anda sedang merakam jejak dan anda berada hampir dengan tempat menarik, tekan Menu -> Penanda -> Sisipkan titik laluan.

string.name: welcome_waypoint_marker_question
